alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Limestone, northwestern Morgan and east central Lawrence Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trinity, or near Decatur, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Moulton, Priceville, Trinity, Courtland, Somerville, Hillsboro, Mooresville and Belle Mina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Flash Flood Warning is also in effect 445 PM CDT.
